sentences.sContent: She looks better than a farmhand really should.
sentences.sContent_eng: She looks better than a farmhand really should.
sentences.sCn: 她比一个实际的农场工人好看多了。

sentences.sContent: Finally, a short, thin man, well past middle age, approached the farmer. "Are you a good farmhand?" the farmer asked him.
sentences.sContent_eng: Finally, a short, thin man, well past middle age, approached the farmer. "Are you a good farmhand?" the farmer asked him.
sentences.sCn: 最后，有一个个头不高、略显瘦弱、已过中年的男人来到农场主面前。“你是个干农活的好手吗？”农场主问他。

trans.tranOther: someone who works on a farm
